data: Then, by Heaven! I’ll leave the country. I won’t stop here to be bullied for doing what scores of other fellows have done and nothing thought about it. It’s unjust, it’s intolerable—
'Then, by Heaven! I'll leave the country. I won't stop here to be bullied for doing what scores of other fellows have done and nothing thought about it. It's unjust, it's intolerable--'
'Then, by Heaven! I’ll leave the country. I won’t stop here to be bullied for doing what scores of other fellows have done and nothing thought about it. It’s unjust, it’s intolerable—'
